title: Radius Server Agent with Supervision Service - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
text: If you want to reject certain messages when the load gets too heavy, you can use the Supervision Service. With this service, you can select one of the following overload protection strategies: Radius_AccessRequest - For rejecting requests of type AccessRequest Radius_AccountingIntermediate - For rejecting AccountingIntermediate requests Radius_AccountingStart - For rejecting AccountingStart requests Radius_AccountingStop - For rejecting AccountingStop requests For each strategy, you can select if you want to reject 25, 50, or 100 % of the requests. See 3.1.8 Workflow Properties for further information.
